name: community-organizations-policy
description: CloudFormation Resource Provider for AWS Organizations Policy

scripts.fixrolepath: sed 's/Path: \"\/\"/Path: \"\/community-types\/\"/g' resource-role.yaml > tmp.txt && mv tmp.txt resource-role.yaml
scripts.prepack: cfn generate && npm run build && npm run fixrolepath
scripts.submit: npm run prepack && cfn submit -vv --region us-east-1 --set-default
scripts.package: npm run prepack && cfn submit --dry-run -vv && cp ${npm_package_name}.zip ${npm_package_name}-${npm_package_version}.zip
scripts.version: npm run package && aws s3 cp ${npm_package_name}-${npm_package_version}.zip s3://community-resource-provider-catalog/${npm_package_name}-${npm_package_version}.zip && aws s3 cp resource-role.yaml s3://community-resource-provider-catalog/${npm_package_name}-resource-role-${npm_package_version}.yml
